mapper.select: select questionnaire_name from questionnaire where teacher_number = #{teacherNumber} and course = #{course} and lab = #{lab}
mapper.delete: delete from questionnaire where teacher_number = #{teacherNumber} and course = #{course} and lab = #{lab} and questionnaire_name = #{questionnaireName}
mapper.select: select * from questionnaire where teacher_number = #{teacherNumber} and course = #{course} and lab = #{lab} and questionnaire_name = #{questionnaireName}
